channel.title: Join the fight and become a full TCUP member!
channel.description: One of us, one of us

item.title: Here's why you should become a full member (and how to do it)
item.author: invalid@example.com (TCUP)
item.category: Join the fight and become a full TCUP member!
item.dc:creator: TCUP
item.content:encoded:
To become a full TCUP member (which will unlock more resources here on the Cupboard), you can do one of the following ---

1. Attend an open meeting
We host open meetings from 10-12pm every third Saturday of the month! Join us for coffee and donuts and get plugged into the work we are doing! Attending one meeting per quarter to keep membership active.

2. Have a one to one with one of our current members.
We want to know you! One of the most important pillars of our organizing is our...

Read more
